data.name: FLASHOUT 3D: Enhanced Edition
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GAMES:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1105330
https://store.steampowered.com/app/860620
https://store.steampowered.com/app/990030
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1761870


OUR STRATEGY GAMES:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1541790
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1287000
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1248060


About the Game



The classical AG racer, FLASHOUT 3D, initially released more than 10 years ago, is back, to celebrate the upcoming launch of FLASHOUT 3! But we bring you not only the first installement of the series for FREE, but we have also remastered it and enhanced with upgraded graphics and new features! Check out the details in the description and don't forget to wishlist FLASHOUT 3 now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1761870

Get into one of your ultra fast ships and join the competition! Use rockets and guns to fight your way to victory in all events and become the best racer in the whole galaxy!



Dominate the grid, master your skills, upgrade your ships, listen to the great tunes, unlock all circuits and get hooked by the fun and exhilarating racing experience!



Features and highlights of the Enhanced Edition:



  • 100% FREE!
  • Upgraded graphics;
  • Ship physics improved;
  • Full gamepad support;
  • Vibrations support added;
  • Improved controls;
  • Remastered intro;
  • Additional animations;
  • Improved visual effects;
  • New UI during races;
  • And more!

data.short_description: The classical AG racer, FLASHOUT 3D, initially released more than 10 years ago, is back, to celebrate the upcoming launch of FLASHOUT 3! But we bring you not only the first installement of the series for FREE, but we have also remastered it and enhanced with upgraded graphics and new features!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Graphics: GeForce 980, Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM. A dedicated video card is required.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
